title: Pixel 4a google assistant not working when mobile data or wifi turned off for simple commands
content:
Simple commands like call , open app not working ,showing "your phons mobile data is turned off ,so I can't help you at the moment".
So far tried:
1. Downloaded offline speech recognition for English us and english (india)
2. Primary language: english us
3. Reset app preferences from phone settings( this works for some time but not permanent solution)
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
